description: This file defines a React component for the Dashboard page of a web application. It fetches various data such as resource counts, cost summaries, and recommendations, and displays KPIs, charts, a recommendations table, and a real-time activity stream. The code includes hooks for state management and effects for data loading.

methods.name: formatInteger
methods.description: Formats a number as an integer string according to the current locale.

methods.name: formatCurrency
methods.description: Formats a number as a currency string in USD according to the current locale.
